lucas » projects


Building Integrated Solar Thermal Shading Application

Joint work with Ming Qu and Steve Peng

This research evaluated the performance of the building integrated solar thermal shading system in terms of energy saving, daylight provision, and solar usage based on a medium office building in Los Angeles. Annual dynamic simulations were conducted to predict the year-round impacts of the BISTS system to the building.
